snippet: Attended the Court, where Mr. Rolland and I had the duty of the First Division ; Sir Robert and Hamilton being both laid up. Dined at Granton and met Lord and Lady Dalhousie, Sir John Hope, etc. I have spelled out some work this day, though I have been rather knocked about.
